name: Lyron Co Ting Keh
bio:
My areas of interest include recursion [eg. Zator: verified inference of a 512 layer CNN using Nova], threshold schemes [eg. Proactive Refresh: cycling key shares for threshold signatures], and low-level cryptography [eg. KZG Chip: an optimized multi-open verifier in Halo2]. 

Acknowledgement: the mentioned projects have all been carried out under tremendous support from 0xPARC and Dan Boneh.
